channel.title: CVE Feed for FlexSolution -- AlfrescoResetPassword
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FlexSolution -- AlfrescoResetPassword

item.title: CVE-2020-15181|2024-08-04T13:08:22.426Z -- flexsolution -- alfrescoresetpassword
item.description: The Alfresco Reset Password add-on before version 1.2.0 relies on untrusted inputs in a security decision. Intruders can get admin's access to the system using the vulnerability in the project. Impacts all servers where this add-on is installed. The problem is fixed in version 1.2.0
